languages.text: Почтенный магос Ханейманн указал на то, что на островах расположено большое количество священных механизмов, отслеживающих сейсмическую активность. Он предположил, что прислуживающие этим машинам {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} могут оказать помощь в разведке.

traits.locale_text: Почтенный магос Ханейманн указал на то, что на островах расположено большое количество священных механизмов, отслеживающих сейсмическую активность. Он предположил, что прислуживающие этим машинам Адептус Механикус могут оказать помощь в разведке.

languages.text: The esteemed Magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.
languages.original_text: Почтенный магос Ханейманн указал на то, что на островах расположено большое количество священных механизмов, отслеживающих сейсмическую активность. Он предположил, что прислуживающие этим машинам {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} могут оказать помощь в разведке.

traits.locale_text: The esteemed magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that Adeptus Mechanicus who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.

The esteemed magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that Adeptus Mechanicus who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.

The esteemed magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that Adeptus Mechanicus who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.

The esteemed Magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.

languages.text: 尊敬捧げられし賢人ヘニュマンの指摘によれば、この島々には地震活動のモニタリングを目的とした聖なる機械が数多くある。それら機械を提供した{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}のメンバーに情報の提供協力を求められると賢人は提案した。
languages.original_text: The esteemed Magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.

traits.locale_text: 尊敬捧げられし賢人ヘニュマンの指摘によれば、この島々には地震活動のモニタリングを目的とした聖なる機械が数多くある。それら機械を提供した{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}のメンバーに情報の提供協力を求められると賢人は提案した。

languages.text: 德高望重的哈努曼贤者指出，群岛上有大量监测地震活动的神圣装置。根据他的提议，负责服务这些机器的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}成员，可以帮忙协助情报的收集工作。
languages.original_text: The esteemed Magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.

traits.locale_text: 德高望重的哈努曼贤者指出，群岛上有大量监测地震活动的神圣装置。根据他的提议，负责服务这些机器的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}成员，可以帮忙协助情报的收集工作。

languages.text: El estimado Magos Haneumann señaló la presencia en las islas de un gran número de mecanismos sagrados utilizados para monitorizar actividades sísmicas. Propuso que tal vez los miembros del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} que atendían tales ingenios podría ayudar con la obtención de información.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.

traits.locale_text: El estimado magos Haneumann señaló la presencia en las islas de un gran número de mecanismos sagrados utilizados para monitorizar actividades sísmicas. Propuso que tal vez el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} que atendía tales ingenios podría ayudar con la obtención de información.

languages.text: Der geschätzte Magos Haneumann führte aus, dass es auf den Inseln eine große Anzahl heiliger Mechanismen zur Beobachtung seismischer Aktivität gab. Er schlug vor, dass Mitglieder des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, der solchen Maschinen diente, zur Informationsbeschaffung beitragen könnten.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.

traits.locale_text: Der geschätzte Magos Haneumann führte aus, dass es auf den Inseln eine große Anzahl heiliger Mechanismen zur Beobachtung seismischer Aktivität gab. Er schlug vor, der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, der solchen Maschinen dient, könnte doch zur Informationsbeschaffung beitragen.

languages.text: L'estimé magos Haneumann fit remarquer que les îles abritaient un grand nombre de mécanismes sacrés servant à surveiller l'activité sismique de la planète. Il proposa donc que les membres de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, qui connaissaient bien ces machines, participent à la collecte d'informations.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.

traits.locale_text: L'estimé magos Haneumann fit remarquer que les îles abritaient un grand nombre de mécanismes sacrés servant à surveiller l'activité sismique de la planète. Il proposa donc que l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, qui connaissait bien ces machines, participe à la collecte d'informations.

languages.text: Muhterem Magos Haneumann, adalardaki sismik faaliyeti izleyen çok sayıda kutsal mekanizma bulunduğunu belirtti. Bu makinelere hizmet eden {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} mensuplarının istihbarat toplamaya katkı sağlayabileceğini ifade etti.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Magos Haneumann pointed out that a large number of sacred mechanisms for monitoring seismic activity were present on the islands. He proposed that members of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} who served such machines could contribute to intelligence gathering.

traits.locale_text: Muhterem Magos Haneumann, adalardaki sismik faaliyeti izleyen çok sayıda kutsal mekanizma bulunduğunu belirtti. Bu makinelere hizmet eden {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} mensuplarının istihbarat toplamaya katkı sağlayabileceğini ifade etti.
